DeviceMappingNumber.description: Unique identifier/address/number for devices of the same DeviceType within a local network

ActualProcessPower.description: Actual calculated process performance (from the view of the TCD: heating = positive value, cooling = negative value)

ActualPumpPower.description: Actual power of the pump in kW

ActualPumpSpeedRPM.description: Actual speed of the pump in revolutions per minute

ActualRegulationRatio.description: Actual Regulation Ratio (heating = positive value, cooling = negative value)

DelayTimeAfterCooling.description: Delay Time after cooling before switching off the TCD

InternalMeasuringPoint.description: Determines whether the temperature of the main or the return is to be controlled

PressureMainLine.description: Actual pressure in the main line (Pressure return line + pump pressure)

PressureReturnLine.description: Actual pressure in the return line

PumpControlMode.description: Defines to which setpoint or function the pump is controlled

StandbyTemperature.description: The standby value temperature is approached with the Method ReduceToStandByOn. The TCD switches off.

SwitchingOffTemperature.description: Defines the temperature to which the TCD must be cooled down before it switches off

TemperatureLimitation.description: This setpoint is for temperature limitation of the mould circuit e.g. to protect the connected tubes or the downstream water distribution system

TemperatureMainLine.description: Actual temperature in the main line

TemperatureReturnLine.description: Actual temperature in the return line

ActualProcessPower_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name ActualProcessPower, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

ActualPumpPower_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name ActualPumpPower, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

ActualPumpSpeedRPM_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name ActualPumpSpeedRPM, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

ActualRegulationRatio_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name ActualRegulationRatio, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

DelayTimeAfterCooling_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name DelayTimeAfterCooling, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

SwitchOff.description: Switch method of the external channel for switching off

SwitchOn.description: Switch method of the external channel for switching on

ControlMode.description: Defines to which setpoint the external channel is controlled

PressureMainLine.description: Actual value of the pressure in the main line

PressureReturnLine.description: Actual value of the pressure in the return line

SwitchedOn.description: Information if the external channel is switched on

ExternalSensorModeOff.description: Deactivate the mode where the external temperature sensor is used for temperature control

ExternalSensorModeOn.description: Activate the mode where the external temperature sensor is used for temperature control

ActualValue.description: Actual value of external temperature sensor

AutomaticModeSwitch.description: Setting whether switching to external sensor is performed automatically (TRUE) or manually (FALSE)

ThermocoupleType.description: Type of connected external temperature sensor

Used.description: Return whether an external temperature sensor is used for control

data.description: Actual value of external temperature sensor
Type of connected external temperature sensor

On.description: Activate the leak stopper mode (emergency operation in case of leaks in the system)

Mode.description: Defines how the medium is to be emptied

Sink.description: Defines where the medium is to be emptied

TemperatureLimit.description: Temperature Limitation of the mould evacuation. TCD is cooled to this temperature first if necessary.

Time_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name Time, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

data.description: Defines how the medium is to be emptied
Defines where the medium is to be emptied
Temperature Limitation of the mould evacuation. TCD is cooled to this temperature first if necessary.
Duration of the mould evacuation

OperatingModeEnumeration.description: Actual operating mode of the TCD

OTHER.description: Operating mode of the TCD is unknown

READY_TO_OPERATE.description: TCD is ready to operate (heating, pump and cooling are switched off)

NORMAL_OPERATION.description: TCD is running in normal operating mode

LEAK_STOPPER.description: TCD is running in leak stopper operating mode

MOULD_EVACUATION.description: TCD is carrying out a mould evacuation process

PRESSURE_RELIEF.description: TCD is carrying out a pressure relief process

COOLING.description: TCD is cooling down to StandbyTemperature and switch off

SAFETY_COOLING.description: TCD is cooling down to SwitchingOffTemperature and switch off

ECO.description: TCD is running in Eco operating mode (energy is saved via the reduced pump speed)

BOOST.description: TCD is running in Boost operating mode (pump runs at maximum possible speed)

IdentifyDevice.description: The TCD on which this method is called shows itself by e.g. activation of a LED

ReduceToStandByOff.description: Deactivate the cooling down function on the TCD. If it is already in progress, it will be interrupted and the device changes back to the last selected operating mode.

ReduceToStandByOn.description: Activate the cooling down function on the TCD followed by switching off

ResetAllErrors.description: Method to reset all errors of the device

Id.description: Id of the error, listed in ActiveErrors, that shall be reset

SwitchOff.description: Main switch method of the TCD for switching off

SwitchOn.description: Main switch method of the TCD for switching on

ActiveErrors.description: List of the active errors of the device

items.title: ActiveErrorDataType
items.description: Iinformation about an active error in a device

Severity.description: Severity as defined in the BaseEventType (1 = low  1000 = high)

Message.description: Message giving information about the error

DeviceMappingNumber.description: Unique identifier/address/number for devices of the same DeviceType within a local network

HighestActiveAlarmSeverity.description: Indication of the severity of the highest active alarm (0 = no active alarm  1000 = possible error)

OperatingMode.title: OperatingModeEnumeration
OperatingMode.description: Actual operating mode of the TCD

HoursOfOperation_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name HoursOfOperation, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

data.description: List of the active errors of the device

items.title: ActiveErrorDataType
items.description: Iinformation about an active error in a device

Severity.description: Severity as defined in the BaseEventType (1 = low  1000 = high)

Message.description: Message giving information about the error

data.description: Actual hours of operation

DisplayLanguage.description: With this Property the client can set the desired language on the user interface at the TCD

ConnectedLoad.description: Connected load, defines the connections of the TCD (pump performance, heating capacity and performance of the remaining components)

CoolingCapacity.description: Power value for cooling, defines the power value for cooling at temperature difference 60 K between cooling water and heat transfer medium

MaxTemperature.description: Defines the maximum working temperature of the TCD

NominalFlowRate.description: Nominal flow rate, defines the maximum achievable flow rate of the TCD

PowerValue.description: Power value, defines the heating capacity of the TCD with the rated voltage

ConnectedLoad_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name ConnectedLoad, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

CoolingCapacity_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name CoolingCapacity, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

PowerValue_EngineeringUnits.description: Unit designator for property and event with name PowerValue, expressed as a URI in the QUDT unit vocabulary

HelpText.description: Text with additional information for the operator

ResetMonitoring.description: With this method the tolerance values are set according to the actual value and the set monitoring sensitivity

ActualValue.description: Actual value of the monitored parameter

AlarmSuppression.description: The start-up alarm suppression deactivates alarms of a monitored parameter during start up or a setpoint jump

AutomaticMonitoring.description: Determination if monitoring tolerance parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

LowerTolerance.description: Lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter

LowerTolerance2.description: Second lower relative tolerance value of the process parameter

MaxValue.description: Maximum absolute value of the process parameter

MinValue.description: Minimum absolute value of the process parameter

MonitoringSensitivity.description: Defines how closely the tolerances are set during the automatic limit setting

SetRampDown.description: Indication if SetValue that is lower than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampDown = 0) or within a given value change per time

SetRampUp.description: Indication if a SetValue that is higher than the actual value shall be reached as fast as possible (SetRampUp = 0) or within a given value change per time

SetValue.description: Set/nominal/target value of the monitored parameter

Status.description: Information if the ActualValue is within the tolerances or has passed a tolerance or min/max value

UpperTolerance.description: Upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter

UpperTolerance2.description: Second upper relative tolerance value of the process parameter

AutoTuningOff.description: Stops an already active self-optimisation process (no control parameters are changed)

AutoTuningOn.description: Starts the self-optimisation of the controller

AutomaticControllerMode.description: Determination if PID Parameters are determined by auto-tuning itself (TRUE) or can be manually adjusted (FALSE)

AutoTuningActive.description: Informs if the automatic tuning is currently active

PIDParameters.description: PID Parameters as array if several input signals (sensors) are used for the control

items.title: PIDParametersDataType
items.description: Structure for storing the parameters of a PID controller

NOT_DUE.description: Maintenance of the device/component is not due

WARNING.description: Maintenance of the device/component is due in the near future

DUE.description: Maintenance of the device/component is due

Reset.description: This Method sets the RemainingInterval to Interval and Status to NOT_DUE_0

AdditionalInformation.description: Additional information on the necessary maintenance. Can be also a link to another document.

RemainingInterval.description: Interval before next maintenance is due

Status.title: MaintenanceStatusEnumeration
Status.description: Maintenance status of the machine/device/component (represented by the parent element)

TotalOperation.description: How long is the component running in total

data.description: Regular interval between two maintenances

DeviceClass.description: Indicates in which domain or for what purpose a certain device is used

Manufacturer.description: Provides the name of the manufacturer of the machine

Model.description: Represents the name of the machine type

SerialNumber.description: Represents the serial number of the machine (unique ID given by the manufacturer)

YearOfConstruction.description: Represents the year of construction of the machine

GetCurrentPage.description: Method for retrieving a screenshot of the control system with the currently shown contents

GetPage.description: Method for retrieving the image of a page of the control system

SetMachineTime.description: Method for setting the server time together with TimeZoneOffset

LocationName.description: Description of the location of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

PageDirectory.description: List of the pages that are implemented in the machine control system and are shown on the screen of the machine

items.title: PageEntryDataType
items.description: Information on a page that is implemented in the machine control system and shown on the screen of the machine

TimeZoneOffset.title: TimeZoneDataType
TimeZoneOffset.description: Difference of the local time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) given by the machine operator or OPC client

UserMachineName.description: Description of the machine given by the machine operator or OPC client

EventId.description: The identifier for the event to comment.

Comment.description: The comment to add to the condition.
